author: rhuijben
msg: Start svnserve as daemon from the swig-ruby tests on Windows.
This ugly hack (which could really use some cleanup from somebody with more
ruby interests than me), fixes +- 70 tests on the buildbot, by removing a
This hack assumes that the buildbot kills svnserve before the next build
(which happens to be the case on our Windows buildbots).
(Svnserve): Replace one ugly hack that starts svnserve, with a different
hack that at least works with reduced privileges.
